text: Ian Watson (born 5 February 1960) is an English former professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from North Shields Category:English footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Rochdale A.F.C. players Category:Newport County A.F.C. players Category:Carlisle United F.C. players Category:Berwick Rangers F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Ian Watson (footballer, born 1960)
